text: "If U Seek Amy" is a song on Britney Spears' sixth album Circus. It was the third single released off that album in early 2009. It hit the top 40 on the Billboard Hot 100. Because of the double entendre in the song, radio stations played an edited version titled "If U See Amy". Category:Britney Spears songs Category:2009 songs Category:Obscenity controversies
title: If U Seek Amy
